channel.title: Help, Silab Items
channel.description:
Im getting this problem, after configuring server to have silab items, when i click on a silab item to wear it, an error appears in server window and i get disconected. error says:
[code]ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:3528 Client type: high memory version UserId: 57361774 Admin is signing onto server. LOADED: 3[/code]---------- THIS IS WHEN I WEAR THE ITEM, IT SHOWS THE FOLLOWING---------- [code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 12000 at client.GetBonus(client.java:29926) at client.initialize(client.java:17857) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:209) at server.main(server.java:50) ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:3530 Client type: high memory version UserId: 57361774 Admin is signing onto server. [client-2-Admin]: Admin is already online.[/code]
.... why is it showing this?
which file is it in, cause i searched all of them and didnt find any "12000" ... thnks

item.title: Help, Silab Items
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Zerk Owner Zerk
item.description:
@Owner_Zerk wrote:

[quote=“games-for-pros, post:5, topic:193056”]Silab item = Jagex Item -.-

anyone KNOW[/quote]

Couldn’t help noticing your signature…

ROFL YOU CANT BE SERIUS, (lol go there everyone)

You spelled ‘Serious’ wrong. Gj smart one.

Read full topic

item.title: Help, Silab Items
item.dc:creator: @games-for-pros games-for-pros
item.description:
@games-for-pros wrote:

Im getting this problem, after configuring server to have silab items, when i click on a silab item to wear it, an error appears in server window and i get disconected. error says:

ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:3528 Client type: high memory version UserId: 57361774 Admin is signing onto server. LOADED: 3---------- THIS IS WHEN I WEAR THE ITEM, IT SHOWS THE FOLLOWING----------

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 12000 at client.GetBonus(client.java:29926) at client.initialize(client.java:17857) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:209) at server.main(server.java:50) ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:3530 Client type: high memory version UserId: 57361774 Admin is signing onto server. [client-2-Admin]: Admin is already online.

… why is it showing this?

which file is it in, cause i searched all of them and didnt find any “12000” … thnks

Read full topic
